/data/pricemulti.name: Multiple Symbols Price
/data/pricemulti.title: # Multiple Symbols Price
/data/pricemulti.description: Same as single API path but with multiple from symbols.

/data/pricemultifull.name: Multiple Symbols Full Price
/data/pricemultifull.title: # Multiple Symbols Full Data
/data/pricemultifull.description: Get all the current trading info (price, vol, open, high, low etc) of any list of cryptocurrencies in any other currency that you need. If the crypto does not trade directly into the toSymbol requested, BTC will be used for conversion.

/data/generateAvg.name: Generate Average
/data/generateAvg.title: # Generate Custom Average
/data/generateAvg.description: Compute the current trading info (price, vol, open, high, low etc) of the requested pair as a volume weighted average based on the exchanges requested.

/data/histoday.name: Daily Historical OHLCV
/data/histoday.title: # Daily Pair OHLCV
/data/histoday.description: Get open, high, low, close, volumefrom and volumeto from the daily historical data. The values are based on 00:00 GMT time. If e=CCCAGG and tryConversion=true, it attempts conversion through BTC or ETH to determine the best possible path. The conversion type and symbol used are appended per historical point. If you want to get all the available historical data, you can use limit=2000 and keep going back in time using the toTs param. You can then keep requesting batches using: &limit=2000&toTs={the earliest timestamp received}.

/data/histohour.name: Hourly Historical OHLCV
/data/histohour.title: # Hourly Pair OHLCV
/data/histohour.description: Get open, high, low, close, volumefrom and volumeto from the hourly historical data. If e=CCCAGG and tryConversion=true, it attempts conversion through BTC or ETH to determine the best possible path. The conversion type and symbol used are appended per historical point. If you want to get all the available historical data, you can use limit=2000 and keep going back in time using the toTs parameter. You can then keep requesting batches using: &limit=2000&toTs={the earliest timestamp received}.

/data/histominute.name: Minute Historical OHLCV
/data/histominute.title: # Minute Pair OHLCV
/data/histominute.description: Get open, high, low, close, volumefrom and volumeto from the each minute historical data. This data is only stored for 7 days, if you need more, use the hourly or daily path.If e=CCCAGG and tryConversion=true, it attempts conversion through BTC or ETH to determine the best possible path. The conversion type and symbol used are appended per historical point. If you want to get all the available historical data, you can use limit=2000 and keep going back in time using the toTs param. You can then keep requesting batches using: &limit=2000&toTs={the earliest timestamp received}.

/data/dayAvg.name: Daily Market Close
/data/dayAvg.title: # Day All Pairs OHLCV (CSV)
/data/dayAvg.description: Only available for enterprise clients (see pricing page if you want to find out more).

/data/dayavg.name: Daily Historical Minute
/data/dayavg.title: # Minute Pair OHLCV (CSV)
/data/dayavg.description: Only available for enterprise clients (see pricing page if you want to find out more).

/data/pricehistorical.name: Price at Specific Time
/data/pricehistorical.title: # Day Pair OHLCV by TS
/data/pricehistorical.description: Get the price of any cryptocurrency in any other currency that you need at a given timestamp. The price comes from the daily info - so it would be the price at the end of the day GMT based on the requested TS.

/data/blockchain/list.name: List of Blockchain Coins
/data/blockchain/list.title: # Available Coin List Valid API key required.
/data/blockchain/list.description: DEPRECATED - As of August 15th 2025 this endpoint will no longer have new data points, as IntoTheBlock have shut down their analytics business.

/data/blockchain/latest.name: Latest Blockchain Data
/data/blockchain/latest.title: # Latest Valid API key required.
/data/blockchain/latest.description: DEPRECATED - As of August 15th 2025 this endpoint will no longer have new data points, as IntoTheBlock have shut down their analytics business.

/data/blockchain/histo/day.name: Daily Blockchain Historical Data
/data/blockchain/histo/day.title: # Historical Daily Valid API key required.
/data/blockchain/histo/day.description: DEPRECATED - As of August 15th 2025 this endpoint will no longer have new data points, as IntoTheBlock have shut down their analytics business.

/data/blockchain/distribution/latest.name: Balance Distribution Latest
/data/blockchain/distribution/latest.title: # Balance Distribution Latest Valid API key required.
/data/blockchain/distribution/latest.description: DEPRECATED - As of August 15th 2025 this endpoint will no longer have new data points, as IntoTheBlock have shut down their analytics business.

/data/blockchain/distribution/day.name: Balance Distribution Daily
/data/blockchain/distribution/day.title: # Balance Distribution Daily Valid API key required.
/data/blockchain/distribution/day.description: DEPRECATED - As of August 15th 2025 this endpoint will no longer have new data points, as IntoTheBlock have shut down their analytics business.

/data/blockchain/staking/latest.name: Staking Rate Latest
/data/blockchain/staking/latest.title: # Staking Rate Latest Valid API key required.
/data/blockchain/staking/latest.description: The Ether staking rate is powered by Attestant , a company dedicated to the business of staking. They provide a non-custodial Ethereum 2 managed staking service, giving customers the ability to stake their Ether using Attestantâ€™s infrastructure while always retaining full control of their assets.

/data/tradingsignals/intotheblock/latest.name: IntoTheBlock Trading Signals Latest
/data/tradingsignals/intotheblock/latest.title: # Trading Signals Latest Valid API key required.
/data/tradingsignals/intotheblock/latest.description: Powered by IntoTheBlock , an intelligence company that leverages machine learning and advanced statistics to extract intelligent signals for crypto-assets.

/data/pair/mapping/fsym.name: Pair Mapping by From Symbol
/data/pair/mapping/fsym.title: # Mapping - From Symbol
/data/pair/mapping/fsym.description: Returns the current pair mapping by mapped symbol.

/data/pair/mapping/exchange.name: Pair Mapping by Exchange
/data/pair/mapping/exchange.title: # Mapping - Exchange
/data/pair/mapping/exchange.description: Returns the current pair mapping by exchange. If no exchange is passed in the e parameter, you will get an object with all the exchanges, otherwise you get an array with mapping object for that specific exchange

/data/pair/mapping/fsym/exchange.name: Pair Mapping by Symbol and Exchange
/data/pair/mapping/fsym/exchange.title: # Mapping - Exchange From Symbol
/data/pair/mapping/fsym/exchange.description: Returns the current pair mapping by exchange symbol.

/data/pair/remapping/planned.name: Planned Pair Remapping
/data/pair/remapping/planned.title: # Planned Pair Mapping Updates
/data/pair/remapping/planned.description: Returns all planned pair re-mapping events.

/data/top/totalvolumefull.name: Top by Total Volume Full Data
/data/top/totalvolumefull.title: # Toplist by 24H Volume Full Data
/data/top/totalvolumefull.description: Get a number of top coins by their total volume across all markets in the last 24 hours. Default value is first page (0) and the top 10 coins.

/data/top/totalvolume/tier.name: Top by Total Top Tier Volume Full
/data/top/totalvolume/tier.title: # Toplist by 24H Top Tier Volume Full Data
/data/top/totalvolume/tier.description: Get a number of top coins by their total top tier volume based on the top 20 markets in the last 24 hours. Default value is first page (0) and the top 10 coins.

/data/top/mktcapfull.name: Top by Market Cap Full Data
/data/top/mktcapfull.title: # Toplist by Market Cap Full Data
/data/top/mktcapfull.description: Get a number of top coins by their market cap. Default value is first page (0) and the top 10 coins.

/data/top/exchanges.name: Top Exchanges by Pair
/data/top/exchanges.title: # Top Exchanges Volume Data by Pair
/data/top/exchanges.description: Get top exchanges by volume for a currency pair. The number of exchanges you get is the minimum of the limit you set (default 5) and the total number of exchanges available

/data/top/exchanges/full.name: Top Exchanges Full Data
/data/top/exchanges/full.title: # Top Exchanges Full Data By Pair
/data/top/exchanges/full.description: Get top exchanges by volume for a currency pair plus the full CCCAGG data. The number of exchanges you get is the minimum of the limit you set (default 5) and the total number of exchanges available

/data/social/coin/latest.name: Latest Coin Social Stats
/data/social/coin/latest.title: # Latest Coin Social Stats Data Valid API key required.
/data/social/coin/latest.description: You can only use this endpoint with a valid api_key . Returns latest social stats data for the coin requested

/data/social/coin/histo/day.name: Historical Daily Social Stats
/data/social/coin/histo/day.title: # Historical Day Social Stats Data Valid API key required.
/data/social/coin/histo/day.description: You can only use this endpoint with a valid api_key . Returns daily social stats data for the coin requested

/data/social/coin/histo/hour.name: Historical Hourly Social Stats
/data/social/coin/histo/hour.title: # Historical Hour Social Stats Data Valid API key required.
/data/social/coin/histo/hour.description: You can only use this endpoint with a valid api_key . Returns hourly social stats data for the coin requested

/data/v2/news.name: Latest News Articles
/data/v2/news.title: # Latest News Articles
/data/v2/news.description: Returns news articles from the providers that CryptoCompare has integrated with.

/data/news/feeds.name: List News Feeds
/data/news/feeds.title: # List News Feeds
/data/news/feeds.description: Returns all the news feeds (providers) that CryptoCompare has integrated with.

/data/news/categories.name: News Article Categories
/data/news/categories.title: # News Article Categories
/data/news/categories.description: Returns news articles categories, you can use them to filter news.

/data/news/feedsandcategories.name: News Feeds and Categories
/data/news/feedsandcategories.title: # List News Feeds and Categories
/data/news/feedsandcategories.description: Returns all the news feeds (providers) that CryptoCompare has integrated with and the full list of categories.

/data/ob/exchanges.name: Exchanges with Order Book Data
/data/ob/exchanges.title: # Exchanges With Order Book Data Valid API key required.
/data/ob/exchanges.description: You can only use this endpoint with a valid api_key . Returns all the exchanges we have order book level 2 data for.

/data/ob/l1/top.name: Order Book Level 1 Top
/data/ob/l1/top.title: # Order Book L1 Top Valid API key required.
/data/ob/l1/top.description: You can only use this endpoint with a valid api_key and correct permissions, please get in touch if you want to test it. . Returns latest order book Level 1 bid/ask values for the requested exchange and pairs in both raw and display formats.

/data/ob/l2/snapshot.name: Order Book Level 2 Snapshot
/data/ob/l2/snapshot.title: # Order Book L2 Snapshot Valid API key required.
/data/ob/l2/snapshot.description: You can only use this endpoint with a valid api_key and correct permissions, please get in touch if you want to test it . Returns latest order book Level 2 data snapshot for the requested exchange.

/data/all/exchanges.name: All Exchanges
/data/all/exchanges.title: # All the Exchanges and Trading Pairs
/data/all/exchanges.description: Returns all the exchanges that CryptoCompare has integrated with. You can filter by exchange and from symbol

/data/all/coinlist.name: All Included Exchanges
/data/all/coinlist.title: # Display Instrument Constituent Pairs
/data/all/coinlist.description: Returns all the constituent exchanges in the requested instrument.

/data/cccagg/pairs.name: CCCAGG Pairs and Exchanges
/data/cccagg/pairs.title: # Display CCCAGG Constituent Pairs
/data/cccagg/pairs.description: Returns all the pairs and exchanges currently included in CCCAGG

/data/cccagg/pairs/excluded.name: CCCAGG Pairs Excluded
/data/cccagg/pairs/excluded.title: # Display CCCAGG Excluded Pairs
/data/cccagg/pairs/excluded.description: Returns all the pairs and exchanges currently not included in CCCAGG

/data/cccagg/pairs/absent.name: CCCAGG Pairs Absent
/data/cccagg/pairs/absent.title: # Display CCCAGG Absent Pairs
/data/cccagg/pairs/absent.description: Returns all the pairs and exchanges that we currently do not have any CCCAGG included pairs so we do not currently compute any CCCAGG price.

/data/top/volumes.name: Top Total Volume
/data/top/volumes.title: # Toplist by 24H Volume Subscriptions
/data/top/volumes.description: Get a number of top coins by their total volume across all markets in the last 24 hours. Default value is first page (0) and the top 10 coins.

/data/top/volume/tier.name: Top Total Top Tier Volume
/data/top/volume/tier.title: # Toplist by 24H Top Tier Volume Subscriptions
/data/top/volume/tier.description: Get a number of top coins by their total top tier volume on the top 20 markets in the last 24 hours. Default value is first page (0) and the top 10 coins.

/data/top/mktcap.name: Top Market Cap
/data/top/mktcap.title: # Toplist by Market Cap Subscriptions
/data/top/mktcap.description: Get a number of top coins by their market cap. Default value is first page (0) and the top 10 coins.

/data/top/volume/direct.name: Top Direct Volume
/data/top/volume/direct.title: # Toplist by Direct Volume
/data/top/volume/direct.description: Get a number of top coins by their total top tier volume on the top 20 markets in the last 24 hours. Default value is first page (0) and the top 10 coins.

/data/top/price.name: Top Price
/data/top/price.title: # Toplist by Price
/data/top/price.description: Get a number of top coins by their price. Default value is first page (0) and the top 10 coins.

/data/index/list.name: List of Indices
/data/index/list.title: # List of available indices Valid API key required.
/data/index/list.description: Most / all indices on this endpoint require a valid api_key and the appropriate permission. The data is for display and research purposes only, contact CoinDesk for licensing options . Returns all the indices we have chosen to list on the public api.

/data/index/value.name: MVIS Index Value
/data/index/value.title: # Single index value Valid API key required.
/data/index/value.description: Most / all indices on this endpoint require a valid api_key and the appropriate permission. The data is for display and research purposes only, contact CoinDesk for licensing options . Get the current value, open, high, low of an index.

/data/index/histo/minute.name: MVIS Historical Minute Data
/data/index/histo/minute.title: # Historical Minute OHLC Valid API key required.
/data/index/histo/minute.description: Most / all indices on this endpoint require a valid api_key and the appropriate permission. The data is for display and research purposes only, contact CoinDesk for licensing options .Get open, high, low, and close minute historical data. You can only get 7 days of minute data though this API, if you need more contact data@cryptocompare.com

/data/index/histo/hour.name: MVIS Historical Hour Data
/data/index/histo/hour.title: # Historical Hourly OHLC Valid API key required.
/data/index/histo/hour.description: Most / all indices on this endpoint require a valid api_key and the appropriate permission. The data is for display and research purposes only, contact CoinDesk for licensing options . Get open, high, low, and close hourly historical data. If you want to get all the available historical data, you can use limit=2000 and keep going back in time using the toTs param. You can then keep requesting batches using: &limit=2000&toTs={the earliest timestamp received}.

/data/index/histo/day.name: MVIS Historical Day Data
/data/index/histo/day.title: # Historical Daily OHLC Valid API key required.
/data/index/histo/day.description: Most / all indices on this endpoint require a valid api_key and the appropriate permission. The data is for display and research purposes only, contact CoinDesk for licensing options . Get open, high, low, and close daily historical data. The values are based on the index closing time. If you want to get all the available historical data, you can use limit=2000 and keep going back in time using the toTs param. You can then keep requesting batches using: &limit=2000&toTs={the earliest timestamp received}.

/data/index/underlying/list.name: List of Underlying Indices
/data/index/underlying/list.title: # List of available underlying indices Valid API key required.
/data/index/underlying/list.description: Most / all indices on this endpoint require a valid api_key and the appropriate permission. The data is for display and research purposes only, contact CoinDesk for licensing options . Returns all the underlying indices we have chosen to list on the public api.
